description: Main entry point for the KindlePlus Flutter mobile application, setting up app initialization, theme, routing, and the root widget.

classes.name: MyApp
classes.description: Root widget of the application, applying global theme and routing, and providing the home widget.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Asynchronous main entry point initializing Flutter bindings and running the app.

methods.name: MyApp.build
methods.description: Builds the MaterialApp widget with theme, routing, and home setup.
